Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params._deliveryDurationSeconds: Delivery duration in seconds from now

acceptContract().notice: Seller accepts the terms and PO

buyerCompletecontract(string).notice: Buyer Completes contract after checking the machine/item are working

confirmDelivery().notice: Buyer confirms delivery and releases 50% of remaining

depositAndStartProduction().notice: Buyer deposits MON and starts production

markShipped(string,string,string,string[.notice: Seller marks the item as shipped

sellerClaimFinalPayment(string).notice: Seller claims remaining funds if buyer doesn't complete or dispute within 14 days of delivery
